name: Race Moto
description:
Ride your Moto at insane speeds through ever changing traffic. Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion. Do you have what it takes to reach TOP SPEED?

HOW TO PLAY
• Tilt your phone/tablet to steer left and right
• Stay away from cars, walls
• Hang on for dear life!

FEATURES
* Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls
* Eye popping high definition 3D graphics
* Lifelike character animations and physics
